The process of upgrading some measures for a company’s success is directly proportional to the growth of the business<\/strong>. Though a business can thrive in terms of customer base, international coverage, number of employees, profits, but majorly revenue is looked upon to determine its actual growth<\/strong>. <\/p>\n\n\n\n

There are several ways of growing a business<\/strong> and reaching the heights of success. One such tool developed by H Igor Ansoff<\/strong> is the Ansoff Matrix<\/strong>. It is a tool adopted by businesses to examine and plan their strategies for growth<\/strong>. <\/p>\n\n\n\n

Also known as the the Product\/Market Expansion Grid<\/strong>, the Ansoff Matrix<\/strong> displays four strategies that can be employed to help a business grow<\/a><\/strong> and help analyse the risk amalgamated with each strategy.<\/p>\n\n\n\n

The Ansoff Matrix<\/strong> has benefited several marketers and executives to understand the risks inherent in advancing their business. Below mentioned are the four strategies of the Ansoff Matrix that can help grow your business<\/strong> exponentially.<\/p>\n\n\n\n

Four Strategies to Grow Your Business with Ansoff Matrix<\/h2>\n\n\n\n
  • Market Penetration<\/a><\/li>
  • Product Development<\/a><\/li>
  • Market Development<\/a><\/li>
  • Diversification<\/a><\/li><\/ul>\n\n\n\n

    Market Penetration<\/h3>\n\n\n\n

    –<\/strong> Focus is on increasing sales of existing products in an existing market.<\/strong><\/p>\n\n\n\n

    The strategy of selling more of the company\u2019s existing products to existing markets is referred to as Market Penetration.<\/strong><\/p>\n\n\n\n

    A business may cut prices, invest more in marketing, improve its distribution network, and expand existing production capacity to penetrate and grow the consumer base in the existing market.<\/p>\n\n\n\n
